meanings.definition: Determining or computing a number or amount
meanings.sent1: She was calculating the total cost of her groceries at the store.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy calculating the tip at restaurants to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The cat was calculating how many treats it could charm out of its owner.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a calculating machine, always processing numbers effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The students were busy calculating the answers to the math problems on the board.
